title: Web Developer
subtitle: Shopify/React/Remix/Next
description:
We are expanding our development team and are looking for a mid/senior-level developer with experience in Shopify (Hydrogen & Liquid), React, and Remix or Next.js. You will be working closely with our design and development teams, using frameworks, open architectures, microservices, and REST/GraphQL APIs in JavaScript runtimes on the client, server, and edge. It doesn’t really matter if you know all the buzzwords — what matters most is your passion and openness to learn quickly and stay hungry.

Our spacious office is located in a building from the late 1800s, right in the heart of Gothenburg. We are a small, collaborative, and creative team looking for someone who wants to grow with us and be part of our future. Please note that this position is on-site in Gothenburg, with some flexible remote options on fixed days of the week.
responsibilities: Shopify and Centra setup and management
